import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { fetchCategories } from '../../redux/features/slices/SliceOne'; const Home = () => { const dispatch = useDispatch(); const productCategory = useSelector(state => state.data.data); useEffect(() => { dispatch(fetchCategories()) }, []) return ( <>

) } export default Home
